title: BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max All in One Wet-Dry Vacuum Cleaner and Mop for Hard Floors and Area Rugs, Black, 2554A
descriptions: Introducing the BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max All in One Wet-Dry Vacuum Cleaner and Mop! This sleek black device not only vacuums and mops, but also supports a great cause - the BISSELL Pet Foundation. With its rotating brush system, 10.5-inch cleaning path width, and improved edge cleaning, this cleaner is perfect for hard floors and area rugs. The cordless design, powered by a 36V Lithium-Ion battery, allows for up to 30 minutes of cleaning time. Plus, it's wifi-connected and features a self-cleaning cycle for convenience. Compatible with multiple surfaces and equipped with a variety of accessories, this all-in-one cleaner is a must-have for any household. Purchase now and make a difference with the BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max!

Introducing the BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max All in One Wet-Dry Vacuum Cleaner and Mop! This incredible machine is a game-changer for your cleaning routine. With a rotating brush system and a wide cleaning path, it effortlessly tackles dirt and grime on hard floors and area rugs. The swivel head and carry handle make it easy to maneuver around your home.

But that's not all - this vacuum cleaner and mop combo is cordless for ultimate convenience. The powerful 36V Lithium-Ion battery provides up to 30 minutes of cleaning time. It's also equipped with improved edge cleaning and a self-cleaning cycle for hassle-free maintenance.

Not only does this device keep your floors sparkling clean, but it also supports a great cause - the BISSELL Pet Foundation. With included accessories like multi-surface trial formulas and brush rolls, you'll have everything you need to keep your home looking its best. Don't miss out on the BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max - the ultimate cleaning companion!

Introducing the BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max All in One Wet-Dry Vacuum Cleaner and Mop, the ultimate cleaning solution for your hard floors and area rugs. This sleek black vacuum offers unmatched versatility with its rotating brush system, allowing you to effortlessly vacuum and mop with one device.

With a cleaning path width of 10.5 inches, swivel head, and improved edge cleaning capabilities, you can easily tackle every corner of your home. The cordless design powered by a 36V Lithium-Ion battery gives you up to 30 minutes of uninterrupted cleaning time. Say goodbye to messy cords and hello to hassle-free cleaning.

Not only does the BISSELL CrossWave deliver exceptional cleaning performance, but it also supports a great cause. With every purchase, you're helping the BISSELL Pet Foundation in their mission to find loving homes for pets in need.

Experience the convenience of Wi-Fi connectivity, self-cleaning cycle, and multi-surface cleaning capabilities. Compatible with a variety of surfaces including tile, sealed wood floors, laminate, and more, this all-in-one cleaner is a game-changer for your cleaning routine.

Included with your purchase are 2 Multi-Surface Trial Formulas, 2 Hard Floor Sanitize Trial Formulas, and 2 Multi-Surface Brush Rolls, making it easier than ever to achieve sparkling clean floors. Don't miss out on the BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max - the perfect blend of performance, convenience, and charitable giving.
